entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Amos
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:37 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
